title: Five-Star Stay in the Hills of India
description: Enjoy fresh air and sweeping mountain views in lush rolling hills set 2,000 metres above sea level with a two or three-night stay in the heritage property of Tamara Kodai, located a scenic 10-minute drive from Kodaikanal city centre. Take in breathtaking views of the valley and indulge in daily breakfast, nightly dinner and a 20-minute reflexology massage each.
offer_address: #22, La Providence, St Mary's Rd, Kodaikanal, Tamil Nadu 624101, India
